Mod.Name: [Tsunamods] Poly-UP (Main Char. Field Models)
Mod.Author: Digixu + AxlRose + Megachocobo + SlimeBucket
Mod.Description: - Replace all Main_chr poly models with their hi-res Textures. - 8x (1024x1024) Upscaled Textures by Magochocobo *used with permission

LatestVersion.ReleaseNotes:
Version 2.5: - The eye bug has been squashed (many thanks to slimebucket for that) - Rinoa white dress has a new face hopefully will not scare as many people.
WARNING - HighPoly Mode WILL CRASH THE GAME on any scene that has more then 3 high poly characters on it.
